import React, { Component, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './recipe-page.sass'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import queryString from 'query-string'; // Add this in your component file // require('react-dom'); // window.React2 = require('react'); // console.log(window.React1 === window.React2); function Recipepage() { const [recData, setRecData] = useState(0); let { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { fetch('/api/getrecipebyid/' + id) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setRecData(data); console.log(recData[0]); }) .catch(err => console.log(err)); }, []); return(
{recData[0].title}
{recData[0].description}
display det symb
Time {recData[0].cookTime}
Serves {recData[0].servings}
{/*{this.props.cookTime}*/}
{/*{this.props.servings}*/}
INGREDIENTS
METHOD
NOTES
diet banner display
Share this recipe
RECOMENDED
); } export default Recipepage;
